mapper.select: select * from pro_categorie where p_high_cate = #{pHighCate} and p_low_cate = #{pLowCate} order by p_keyword asc
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_categorie (p_keyword, p_high_cate, p_low_cate) values (#{pKeyword}, #{pHighCate}, #{pLowCate})
select last_insert_id()

insert into product (m_no, p_c_no, price, p_content, p_reg_date, deal_type, deal_step, quality, deal_opt, p_addr, p_lat, p_lon) values (#{mNo}, #{pCategorieNo}, #{price}, #{pContent}, now(), #{dealType}, #{dealStep}, #{quality}, #{dealOpt}, #{pAddr}, #{pLat}, #{pLon})

insert into pro_photo (p_no, p_ph_path, p_ph_thum, p_ph_name) values (#{pNo}, #{pPhotoPath}, #{pPhotoThum}, #{pPhotoName})
